players.name: Alice
memory: Diana: "I'm shocked by Bob's sudden death. We should all be on high alert and work together to find out who did this."
You: "Let's work together to figure out who killed Bob. We should ask each other questions and try to gather information."
Charlie: "I'm glad we're all working together to find the killer. Diana, I have to ask you again: are you sure you didn't kill Bob?"
Diana: "I have an alibi for the night of Bob's death. I was at the hospital taking care of my sick grandmother. I hope this puts everyone's minds at ease and we can focus on finding the real killer."
